title: Firefly raises $75 million as it prepares for second launch
summary: Launch vehicle developer Firefly Aerospace has raised $75 million in a new funding round as the company, now under new ownership, prepares for a second launch of its Alpha rocket this spring.

title: After 9 difficult months, Firefly is set to take its next shot at orbit
summary: The launch company is targeting mid-July for Alpha's next launch.

title: Rocket Report: India wants its own SpaceX, Firefly targets July for Alpha launch
summary: "We will have our own SpaceX in the next two years."

title: Firefly gears up for second Alpha launch
summary: Firefly Aerospace is preparing for the second launch of its Alpha rocket in late August or early September, hoping that a successful mission can enable a “step change” in activity for the company.

title: Firefly hires new CEO ahead of second launch
summary: Firefly Aerospace has hired an executive with extensive experience in aerospace and defense as its next CEO as the company gears up for its second orbital launch attempt.

title: SpaceX, Firefly Aerospace targeting three rocket launches in two days
